meanings.definition: The seed of the flax plant, used as a source of oil and as a food ingredient.
meanings.sent1: I added linseeds to my smoothie for extra nutrients.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for a sprinkle of linseeds on top of the salad.
meanings.sent3: When the linseeds started dancing in the pan, I knew the stir-fry was going to be delicious.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were like linseeds, small but packed with potential.
meanings.sent5: The linseeds glistened in the sunlight, tempting the birds nearby.
